column3:
I like this; it uses the proper c++ idiom (RAII) which is more readable and potentially more robust.

Can you add testcase/unittest?
It would be nice to test that Critical section code actually works by spawning threads and testing locks in the test suite.\n
I'm going to merge this early-- writing multithreaded unit tests would be spiffy, but second-best is to merge early and get lots of testing.\n
